import "./post.scss" import FavoriteBorderOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorderOutlined"; import FavoriteOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/FavoriteOutlined"; import TextsmsOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/TextsmsOutlined"; import ShareOutlinedIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShareOutlined"; import MoreHorizIcon from "@mui/icons-material/MoreHoriz"; import { Link } from "@mui/material"; import Comments from "../comments/Comments"; const Post = ({post}) => { const liked = false return (
{post.name} 1 min ago

{post.desc}

{liked ? : } 12 likes
12 Comments
Share
{}
) } export default Post
